segments.text: What does a housing go for in south mountain district ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It depends on the type of the house you're looking for .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We ’ re looking for a three-bedroom home .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ’ s your general price range ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Umm , I think I would be hard to find something in that range in this area . You know the environment in the south mountain district is the nicest .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A two-bedroom house in this area is generally around 250,000 RIB .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I recommend you buy a two-bedroom house . It is very suitable for a couple , and some two-bedroom houses are large enough for a one-child family .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , I will take it into consideration .
segments.speaker: S1
